<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_rte_eb_multi_in_script_operation"><sys_rte_eb_multi_in_script_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><conditional_fields/><conditional_script><![CDATA[/* Example Script
(function(batch, output) {
    for (var i = 0; i < batch.length; i++) {
        
        // step1: access the input variables
        var a = batch[i].input;

        // step2: your script code goes here
        // based on the input variables assign variable 'b' to true or false.
        var b = true; // or false;

        // step3: set the output for each element
        output[i] = b;
    }
})(batch, output);
*/
(function(batch, output) {
    // add your code here
    
})(batch, output);]]></conditional_script><is_conditional>false</is_conditional><name>Multiple Input Script - u_card_alias1,u_card_alias2</name><operation_group/><order>100</order><script><![CDATA[(function(batch, output) {
   for (var i = 0; i < batch.length; i++) {
      var input = batch[i].input; // Value of the input columns concatenated with '|'.
      if (batch[i].u_card_alias1 && batch[i].u_card_alias2) {
         output[i]=batch[i].u_card_alias1 + ',' + batch[i].u_card_alias2;
      } else if (batch[i].u_card_alias1 ) {
         output[i]=batch[i].u_card_alias1 ;
      } else if (batch[i].u_card_alias2) {
         output[i]=batch[i].u_card_alias2 ;
      }
   }
})(batch, output);]]></script><source_sys_rte_eb_field/><source_sys_rte_eb_fields>7c0b9bea1bfdca90269e97d2b24bcb15,cd0b9bea1bfdca90269e97d2b24bcb1c</source_sys_rte_eb_fields><sys_class_name>sys_rte_eb_multi_in_script_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>alex.frankel@exfo.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-04-29 15:09:56</sys_created_on><sys_id>960223aa1b310e90269e97d2b24bcbdd</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Multiple Input Script - u_card_alias1,u_card_alias2</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Service Graph Connector for EXFO" source="x_exfo2_cmdb">073e67c91b3f4650ea26c9d3604bcb38</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_rte_eb_definition display_value="SG-EXFO Card Children">36fad7ea1bfdca90269e97d2b24bcbf5</sys_rte_eb_definition><sys_rte_eb_entity display_value="temp">b00b5bea1bfdca90269e97d2b24bcbd0</sys_rte_eb_entity><sys_scope display_value="Service Graph Connector for EXFO">073e67c91b3f4650ea26c9d3604bcb38</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_rte_eb_multi_in_script_operation_960223aa1b310e90269e97d2b24bcbdd</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>alex.frankel@exfo.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-04-29 15:09:56</sys_updated_on><target_sys_rte_eb_field display_value="distinguished_name">960223aa1b310e90269e97d2b24bcbda</target_sys_rte_eb_field><target_sys_rte_eb_fields/><type display_value="Multiple Input Script">a5584ee4739000102b6265a751ab9eae</type><use_unique_input_sets>true</use_unique_input_sets></sys_rte_eb_multi_in_script_operation></record_update>
